### Checklist

- [ ] Frontmatter filled in (`rfc`, `title`, `status`, `authors`, `created`, `updated`)
- [ ] File name is `kebab-case`, ASCII only, no Cyrillic
- [ ] Language is English throughout
- [ ] Linked to a GitHub Issue (`closes #N`)
- [ ] SlopTask ticket referenced
- [ ] RFC number is next available sequential number
